org.gbif.registry.ws.security

Class LegacyRequestAuthorization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.registry.ws.security.LegacyRequestAuthorization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext

    public class LegacyRequestAuthorization
extends Object
implements javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext
    Class providing temporary authorization for legacy web service requests (GBRDS/IPT).

    • Method Detail

      • isAuthorizedToModifyOrganization

        public boolean isAuthorizedToModifyOrganization()
        Determine if HTTP request is authorized to modify Organization. The difference between this method and isAuthorizedToModifyOrganization(organizationKey) is that the organizationKey must first be parsed from the form parameters.
        Returns:
        true if the HTTP request is authorized to modify Organization
        See Also:
        isAuthorizedToModifyOrganization(UUID)

      • isAuthorizedToModifyOrganization

        public boolean isAuthorizedToModifyOrganization(UUID organizationKey)

      • getOrganizationKeyFromParams

        public UUID getOrganizationKeyFromParams()
        Retrieves the organizationKey from the requests' form parameters.
        Returns:
        key or null if not found

      • isAuthorizedToModifyOrganizationsDataset

        public boolean isAuthorizedToModifyOrganizationsDataset(UUID datasetKey)
        Determine if HTTP request is authorized to modify a Dataset belonging to an Organization. This method checks that the same organizationKey is specified in the credentials and HTTP form parameters, that the Organization corresponding to that organizationKey exists, that the Dataset corresponding to the datasetKey exists, that the Dataset is owned by that Organization, and that the correct organization password has been supplied.
        Parameters:
        datasetKey - Dataset key
        Returns:
        true if the HTTP request is authorized to modify a Dataset belonging to Organization

      • isAuthorizedToModifyInstallation

        public boolean isAuthorizedToModifyInstallation(UUID installationKey)
        Determine if HTTP request is authorized to modify Installation.
        Parameters:
        installationKey - Installation key
        Returns:
        true if the HTTP request is authorized to modify Installation
